name: ?.title
tags: $merge([{name: 'requisition_id', value: ?.requisition_id}, {name: 'confidential', value: ?.confidential}, {name: 'status', value: ?.status}, {name: 'opened_at', value: ?.opened_at}, {name: 'closed_at', value: ?.closed_at}, {name: 'employment_type', value: ?.custom_fields?.employment_type}, {name: 'maximum_budget', value: ?.custom_fields?.budget.value}, {name: 'is_template', value: ?.is_template}, {name: 'copied_from_id', value: ?.copied_from_id}], ?.departments || [] | $map({name: 'departments', value: .name}), ?.offices || [] | $map({name: 'offices', value: .name}))
